items.sentence: Tom and Mary walked down the street, holding hands.
Tom lives in the same housing complex as Mary does.
Tom loves art more than anything else in the world.
Tom and Mary are having a little financial trouble.
Tom and Mary are planning to visit Boston together.
Do you really think it\'s safe to drink this water?
Are you sure that Tom wasn\'t the one who did that?
As far as I can tell, Tom\'s French is pretty good.
Tom apparently didn\'t do what he said he would do.
Tom deleted all of Mary\'s pictures from his phone.
Tom followed the stream for a couple of kilometers.
Tom had a chance to do that, but he decided not to.
Neither Tom nor Mary has decided to move to Boston.
Tom can\'t forgive himself for what he did to Mary.
Tom can\'t get the bottle open. Could you help him?
Tom can\'t go out because he has a lot of homework.
Tom planned a surprise birthday party for his wife.
Tom often eats popcorn when he\'s watching a movie.
What is Tom doing here? I thought he was in Europe.
Tom is sure that Mary will be at the party tonight.
Tom is the kind of guy who likes to try new things.
Tom is the kind of man who knows how to make money.
I don\'t think Tom and Mary have to work on Monday.
I don\'t think Tom is the right person for the job.
Do you really think it\'ll be difficult to do that?
I\'ve been thinking about the first time I met Tom.
I\'ve been trying to find out what happened to Tom.
I\'ve been wanting to do this for a very long time.
Tom wouldn\'t have sung if we hadn\'t asked him to.
If you\'re not listening to the radio, turn it off.
Mary is one of the girls that Tom is interested in.
There are a lot of people that want to talk to Tom.
I\'d really like to know why Tom isn\'t here today.
I\'ll be singing a song at Tom and Mary\'s wedding.
I\'ll never forget what you\'ve done for my family.
I\'m afraid that you\'re sitting in the wrong seat.
Tom will try to find out why Mary wants to do that.
Tom wished he were able to visit Boston more often.
Tom wished that he could spend more time with Mary.
Tom wants Mary to think you\'re a little dangerous.
Tom wants to make sure that doesn\'t happen to him.
Tom said he was just too tired to do anything else.
Tom said he was ready to do whatever was necessary.
I haven\'t heard from Tom since he moved to Boston.
Tom asked Mary if she was free on Valentine\'s Day.
Tom asked Mary to marry him soon after they\'d met.
Tom bought a couple of books and gave them to Mary.
Tom broke his neck falling down a flight of stairs.
Tom practices speaking French every chance he gets.
I know that plenty of guys want to go out with you.
